{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Science and technology studies {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Science and technology studies Science and technology studies or science, technology and society studies (both abbreviated STS ) are the study of how society, politics, and culture affect scientific research and technological innovation, and how these, in turn, affect society, politics and culture. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Science and technology studies)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
